Action Surge: Take an extra action 2/short rest
Banishing Arrow: Arrow inflicts +2d6 HP force and sends target to Feywild (DC 18 Cha neg) for 1 rd
Beguiling Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP psychic, target charmed by ally w/in 30' (DC 18 Wis neg)
Bursting Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP force damage in 10' radius
Curving Shot: Redirect magic arrow miss to other target w/in 60'
Enfeebling Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP necrotic damage and half damage on attacks by target (DC 18 Con neg) for 1 rd
Ever-Ready Shot: Minimum 1 Arcane Shot use after initiative
Ferocious Charger: Hit after 10' move knocks foe prone 1/rd (DC 16 Str neg)
Fighting Spirit: Gain Adv on attacks and 15 temporary HP for 1 tn 3/long rest
Grasping Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP poison damage and -10' Speed and 4d6 HP slashing/rd for 1 min (DC 18 Athletics check ends)
Great Weapon Master: Bonus attack after crit or reducing foe to 0 HP; trade -5 attack w/heavy weapon for +10 damage
Hold The Line: R5' Foe move provokes OA; hit negates move
Magic Arrow: Arrows count as magic weapons
Piercing Arrow: Arrow passes through cover harmlessly and inflicts +2d6 HP piercing damage to targets in 30'x1' line (DC 18 Dex half)
Polearm Master: Bonus attack w/polearm butt inflicts 1d4 HP bludgeoning, OA when foe enters reach
Rapid Strike: Trade Adv on attacks for extra attack 1/rd
Savage Attacker: Take best of two melee damage rolls 1/rd
Second Wind: Regain 1d10+20 HP 1/short rest
Seeking Arrow: Arrow ignores 3/4 cover, inflicts +2d6 HP force damage, and reveals target (DC 18 Dex half and no reveal)
Shadow Arrow: Arrow inflicts +4d6 HP psychic damage and 5' vision (DC 18 Wis neg) for 1 rd
Strength Before Death: Take extra turn when brought to 0 HP 1/long rest
Tireless Spirit: Minimum 1 Fighting Spirit use after initiative
Unwavering Mark: Struck foe suffers Disadv on attacks on others and provokes self bonus attack w/Adv and +10 HP weapon damage for 1 rd 2/long rest
Vigilant Defender: Use Reaction for OA on every other creature's turn
Warding Maneuver: R5' Give +1d8 AC and damage resistance to ally when struck 1/long rest
Save Proficiency: Constitution; Strength; Wisdom
Save: Charisma: 2; Constitution: 7; Dexterity: 1; Intelligence: 4; Strength: 8; Wisdom: 7

Elegant Courtier: Save Proficiency (Wisdom)
Indomitable: May re-roll failed save 3/long rest
